text: Godrich Gardee is a South African politician, MP & Secretary General of the Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF). He became involved in politics from 1985. He has Higher National Diploma in Accounting and Auditing.Godrich Ahmed Gardee :: People's Assembly National Parliament| PICS: EFF'S GODRICH GARDEE GRADUATES WITH LLB! | Daily Sun == References == Category:South African politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Godrich Gardee
